text: Egha Batseba, Adoniya bagha Atrivim Solomon mɨkɨmasa zuir dughiamɨn, atrivim dɨkavigha, ziar ekiam uan amebam danɨngasava uan tevimning apɨrigha uan dapanim avira. Egha a ua uan atrivir dabirabim gaperagha, egha ingangarir gumazibav geima, me dabirabir mam inigha iza Atrivim Solomonɨn dabirabimɨn vongɨn an agharir guvimɨn anetɨzɨ, Batseba a gapera.
